name: Angel of Retribution

name: Aven Trooper

name: Cleansing Meditation

Threshold — If seven or more cards are in your graveyard, instead destroy all enchantments, then return all cards in your graveyard destroyed this way to the battlefield.

name: Equal Treatment

name: Floating Shield
oracle_text: Enchant creature
As Floating Shield enters the battlefield, choose a color.
Enchanted creature has protection from the chosen color. This effect doesn't remove Floating Shield.
Sacrifice Floating Shield: Target creature gains protection from the chosen color until end of turn.

name: Frantic Purification
oracle_text: Destroy target enchantment.
Madness {W} (If you discard this card, discard it into exile. When you do, cast it for its madness cost or put it into your graveyard.)
flavor_text: By definition, madness ends in one of two ways: clarity . . . or death.

name: Hypochondria
oracle_text: {W}, Discard a card: Prevent the next 3 damage that would be dealt to target creature or player this turn.
{W}, Sacrifice Hypochondria: Prevent the next 3 damage that would be dealt to target creature or player this turn.

name: Major Teroh
oracle_text: Flying
{3}{W}{W}, Sacrifice Major Teroh: Exile all black creatures.
flavor_text: "I am the holy wind that shall avenge the Cabal's victims."

name: Militant Monk
oracle_text: Vigilance
{T}: Prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt to target creature or player this turn.

name: Morningtide
oracle_text: Exile all cards from all graveyards.
flavor_text:

name: Stern Judge
oracle_text: {T}: Each player loses 1 life for each Swamp he or she controls.

name: Transcendence
oracle_text: You don't lose the game for having 0 or less life.
When you have 20 or more life, you lose the game.
Whenever you lose life, you gain 2 life for each 1 life you lost. (Damage dealt to you causes you to lose life.)

name: Vengeful Dreams
oracle_text: As an additional cost to cast Vengeful Dreams, discard X cards.
Exile X target attacking creatures.

name: Ambassador Laquatus

flavor_text:
"He smiles with poisoned lips."
—Empress Llawan

name: Aquamoeba

flavor_text: Some tides need no moon.

name: Balshan Collaborator
oracle_text: Flying
{B}: Balshan Collaborator gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"Power, gold, crackers—every bird has its price."
—Chainer, dementia master

name: Breakthrough

name: Cephalid Aristocrat
oracle_text: Whenever Cephalid Aristocrat becomes the target of a spell or ability, put the top two cards of your library into your graveyard.

name: Cephalid Illusionist
oracle_text: Whenever Cephalid Illusionist becomes the target of a spell or ability, put the top three cards of your library into your graveyard.

name: Cephalid Vandal

name: Churning Eddy

Madness {U} (If you discard this card, discard it into exile. When you do, cast it for its madness cost or put it into your graveyard.)

name: Plagiarize

name: Skywing Aven
oracle_text: Flying

name: Far Wanderings
oracle_text: Search your library for a basic land card, put that card onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle your library.
Threshold — If seven or more cards are in your graveyard, instead search your library for up to three basic land cards, put them onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle your library.

name: Gurzigost
oracle_text: At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Gurzigost unless you put two cards from your graveyard on the bottom of your library.
{G}{G}, Discard a card: You may have Gurzigost assign its combat damage this turn as though it weren't blocked.

name: Insist
oracle_text: The next creature spell you cast this turn can't be countered.
Draw a card.
flavor_text:
"Finesse is no match for brute force."
—Seton, centaur druid

name: Invigorating Falls
oracle_text: You gain life equal to the number of creature cards in all graveyards.
flavor_text: Krosan druids do not fear death, for they know that nature will only prosper from their passing.

name: Krosan Constrictor
oracle_text: Swampwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Swamp.)
{T}: Target black creature gets -2/-0 until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"It's a slithering, coldblooded menace. I've gotta respect that."
—Braids, dementia summoner

name: Krosan Restorer
oracle_text: {T}: Untap target land.
Threshold — {T}: Untap up to three target lands. Activate this ability only if seven or more cards are in your graveyard.

name: Nantuko Blightcutter
oracle_text: Protection from black
Threshold — Nantuko Blightcutter gets +1/+1 for each black permanent your opponents control as long as seven or more cards are in your graveyard.

name: Nantuko Calmer
oracle_text: {G}, {T}, Sacrifice Nantuko Calmer: Destroy target enchantment.
Threshold — Nantuko Calmer gets +1/+1 as long as seven or more cards are in your graveyard.

name: Nantuko Cultivator
oracle_text: When Nantuko Cultivator enters the battlefield, you may discard any number of land cards. Put that many +1/+1 counters on Nantuko Cultivator and draw that many cards.

name: Narcissism
oracle_text: {G}, Discard a card: Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn.
{G}, Sacrifice Narcissism: Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

name: Nostalgic Dreams
oracle_text: As an additional cost to cast Nostalgic Dreams, discard X cards.
Return X target cards from your graveyard to your hand. Exile Nostalgic Dreams.
flavor_text: Seton dreams of life renewed.

name: Parallel Evolution
oracle_text: For each creature token on the battlefield, its controller creates a token that's a copy of that creature.
Flashback {4}{G}{G}{G} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

name: Possessed Centaur
oracle_text: Trample
Threshold — As long as seven or more cards are in your graveyard, Possessed Centaur gets +1/+1, is black, and has "{2}{B}, {T}: Destroy target green creature."

name: Seton's Scout
oracle_text: Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.)
Threshold — Seton's Scout gets +2/+2 as long as seven or more cards are in your graveyard.

name: Cabal Coffers
oracle_text: {2}, {T}: Add {B} to your mana pool for each Swamp you control.
flavor_text: Deep within the Cabal's vault, the Mirari pulsed like a dead sun—and its darkness radiated across Otaria.

{T}: Add {W} or {B} to your mana pool. Activate this ability only if you control a Swamp.

{T}: Add {U} or {B} to your mana pool. Activate this ability only if you control a Swamp.
